name: Raid On Redwood
description:
The Emerson Boys has over took Redwood and it is your job as sheriff to put their plans to rest in a grave!

Raid on Redwood is a top down western shooter survival game that took months of hard work in order to come together so I invite everyone to download it and give it a try!

All the 3D assets and code was made by me from learning Unity and Blender. This is my first full game I have made in the engine and I am getting comfortable with it but let me know if there is any changes or improvements you would like to see me change and I will get to working on it. I am keeping the cost of this game open but I want to thank those who decide to donate something. I have made this game to get some experience under my belt and to see where this journey goes.

Controls

Plug in and play with any PS4 and Xbox Controller you have available!

Download Instructions

1: Download the zip file.

2: Extract the folder and files within to your desktop

3: Run the .exe and install the game!
